mapper.select: SELECT p.id, pi.image_url as mainThumbnail, NVL(l.likeCount, 0) AS likeCount FROM posts p INNER JOIN ( SELECT post_id, image_url FROM post_images WHERE image_order = 1 ) pi ON p.id = pi.post_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM post_likes GROUP BY post_id ) l ON p.id = l.post_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
